labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: Channel remains unread and has to be manually marked
data.expected_result: Channel is mark as read as there are no new messages visible
data.short_description: Unable to view channel without history perms to mark it as read
data.steps_to_repro: - Make a channel without read permissions - Log off and have somebody send a message there or reload after the message is received - Observe channel - Switch to another channel
